attributes.action: Cease the Continued Bulking Up of Kyal Marsh
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Australian national, Kyal Marsh, has been "bulking up" far too much. This petition is intended to request that the Governor of Australia make representations  to one Kyal Marsh that the great British public, undersigned, request that the bulking up ceases.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
